name: ♡ Beef Daddy ♡
description:
"Moo."

Welcome to the Disco. Although, you might have gone to the wrong one. Ah. Oh no. The door's locked... Hey, do you hear that sound in the background?

Kind of sounds like... a cow?

Controls:

[WASD] - Move around

[E] - Interact with surrounding objects

Mouse Button - Camera angle

Gameplay:

Run around the place and try to escape! Avoid being caught and find the code to unlock the door.

The Team:

Alexandro Di Nunzio - Director/Technical Artist

Catherine Turuta - UI Artist/Level Designer

Cindy Vu - 3D Modeler/Texture Artist

Hong Tran - Gameplay Programmer

Ibrahim Abdul Hammed - AI Programmer

Ramisha Wasim - UI Artist/3D Modeler

Asset Credits:

Music: Halloween Disco by Stardiva Music

Font: Discoteque St by Southype

Human & Cow Models/Animations by Quaternius

Keypad UI by Robotparts
